TransactionHelper

class TransactionHelper (View source)

Provides helper methods for working with Craft's database transactions.

Properties

protected CDbConnection $db The Craft database connection.

Methods

__construct( $db)

Constructor.

CDbTransaction|null
begin()

If a database transaction does not exist, begins a new transaction, and returns it. If a database transaction already exists, returns null.

commit(mixed $transaction)

Commits the transaction, if it is a valid transaction.

bool
isValidTransaction(mixed $transaction)

Returns a boolean, indicating whether the given argument is a valid transaction.

rollback(mixed $transaction)

Rolls back the transaction, if it is a valid transaction.
